name: NEET
description:
NEET is a simulation of the shut-in lifestyle on a halloween night.

Alone in a big house, you have to manage yourself and the trick or treaters that visit you.

Inspired by The Sims 1, Space Station 13 and Papers Please.

You may remember it from this very old version:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

README / TIPS

Most things are meant to be interacted with although a lot of things are not functional yet. The posters in your room explain the controls but take note that you can hold TAB to make a little cursor appear which lets you interact with things like the microwave or the texts in your "spacebar" UI. You can also crouch (ctrl) next to big chairs or the toilets to trigger sitting on them. 

In case you've completed the demo once (this will be made obvious if you get there), you can press the non-numpad "minus" key to trigger the visitors near instantly and see what other choices are available even if conversations aren't very complex atm.

Feedback is always appreciated!
